law.text: An applicant who fails an examination shall be eligible upon reapplication for the next regular examination upon the payment of an additional application fee. Applications shall be canceled one (1) year after receipt thereof, in the event the applicant fails to appear for examination.
law.history: Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 9, effective June 16, 1960. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3909b-1.
